titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I read McKecknie's "Magna Carta" – a learned but technical book. After lunch I attended the meeting of Senate at the Castle. The question of conferring Honorary Degrees was deferred. There seemed some notion that decency required an abstinence from such honorific performances during the war.
